title: Russia's International Memorial Society liquidated after Supreme Court ruling
content:
1. Russia's International Memorial Society liquidated after Supreme Court ruling  The Washington Post
  2. Russian Court Orders Liquidation of the Human Rights Group Memorial  The New York Times
  3. Russia orders shutdown of human rights group for creating 'false image' of USSR  Fox News
  4. Russia orders top rights group shut, capping year of crackdowns  Reuters
  5. Russian court shuts down human rights group Memorial International  CNN
